channel.title: Need fire cape help here!
channel.description: hello i have been having trouble with my hybridscape....whenever i do ::item 6570 or ::pickup 6570 1 wich is fire cape...i get my fire cape but when i put it on my server cant move and if i try to logg in i ned to restart again and again and i cant get into the acc. why does my fire cape not work and how will i be able to make it work on my own server?

item.title: Need fire cape help here!
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

Okay heres the Deal. Fire cape are consistant to lagging the server which pretty much means that they are useless and should be destroyed so i recommend it as a banned item. I have it banned from my server. So i think you should have a lava cape unless you fix the problem ask God of ilkiki he has a server with lava cape which has water running down its tight and doesnt lagg the server.

King Dawgs

Read full topic
